author: huntingisland
content: I heard more about the proposal on Ethereum Magicians, and I do think stake % targeting can work fine if we allow negative returns. We may have to crank the dial a bit, but we can get people to unstake if we burn enough of their ETH.

author: huntingisland
content: The main opposition I have heard is that Lido? / some other contracts may not be able to deal with negative issuance. To which I would say "fix your contract and replace it".

author: huntingisland
content: I agree we need to get this done and deployed to the network in 2024.

author: huntingisland
content: At this point my inclination is % stake targeting, variable return, and negative return if needed to move towards the target.
